title: Ester Dean Interview
itunes:title: Ester Dean Interview
description:
Ester Dean stops through to chat about her role in Pitch Perfect, all of the hits she's written for people and her upcoming music.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
